doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 38
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 38
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."

2. Footage of Empire State Pride Agenda dinner. Includes Ann Northrop interviewing Brendan Fay, activist, regarding dissatisfaction with NYC Mayor Giuliani on gay issues. Also includes Andy Humm interviewing Christopher Lynn regarding Giuliani. Also includes Lee Sharmat interviewing various attendees regarding Giuliani. Also includes Senator Kennedy and Rudolph Giuliani speaking to group.
COMMERCIAL: Visit the AIDS Memorial Quilt
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, International Association of Clerks, Recorders, Election Officials, & Treasurers, "Vote for Yourself"
4. Interview: Christine Quinn, Executive Director of the Anti-Violence Project, regarding the death penalty case of Michael Hale.
6. Interview: Patrick Merla, author, discusses his book "Boys Like Us".
7. Patrick Giles, Literary Editor of LGNY (Lesbian and Gay New York), discusses his queer newspaper.
8. Lou Maletta interviews Torie Osborn, author, regarding her book "Coming Home to America".
9. Footage of the Folsom Street Fair in San Francisco.
